name: Minke-android
body:
### Welcome to Minke.
Minke is a simple, yet powerful shopping assistant for Android. It also has a [web interface](http://shop-minke.appspot.com/) which is maintained [here](https://github.com/pieterjordaan/minke-web). 
Minke focuses on bringing you accurate and relevant
information about products and stores through the use of the ZXing Barcode Scanner. Furthermore it provides additional shopping information such as which is the best store to do shopping for your shopping list and allows you to compare products across stores.
Download it [here](https://github.com/downloads/pieterjordaan/minke-web/minke.apk)

***

### Author
In 2012, Pieter Jordaan (@pieterjordaan) started work on Minke.

***
